testcase.name: SOAP 1.2 validation test case 1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "application/soap+xml; charset=utf-8" ........... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == ["Microsoft-IIS/7.5"] ................ passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/7.5" ............... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "104" ........................................... passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == 104 ....................... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed
